LongDescription:
Northbound [4] and [5] trains are running local from Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall to 14 St-Union Sq.
Some northbound [5] trains are stopping along the [2] line from Nevins St to 149 St-Grand Concourse.
Some southbound [6] trains end at Bowling Green.
These service changes are because of a train with mechanical problems at Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall.
Expect delays in [2], [3], [4], [5] and [6] train service.
